snippet: The proposal is an attempt to reduce “the market presence” of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, the Federal Housing Finance Agency said.
abstract: Federal Housing Finance Agency unveils plan in which Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac would gradually reduce maximum size of home loans they can buy; plan could begin as soon as Oct 2014.
lead_paragraph: The proposal is an attempt to reduce “the market presence” of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, the Federal Housing Finance Agency said.

headline.main: U.S. May Cut Its Presence in Supporting Mortgages
headline.print_headline: U.S. May Cut Its Presence In Supporting Mortgages

keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
keywords.name: organizations
